name: The Lowest Level
description:
(This game performs best in Firefox)
You play as Ezmay Charles, a messed up kid with a harsh up bringing including an abusive father and brother. Her father has gotten access to her and you need to get away from him. 

https://waterfallbayassist.wixsite.com/mysite (Waterfall Bay Hospital Website)

https://ezmay699474834.wordpress.com (Ezmay's blog)
